title: WATCH: Neves' sensational strike
description: Ruben Neves scored a sensational goal to give Wolves an early lead against Sheffield United.
content: The club's record signing had already netted on three occasions this season, with all three having been scored from outside of the 18-yard box.And the 20-year-old added to his haul of long distance stunners on Saturday against the Blades after George Baldock had dispossessed Ivan Cavaleiro, taking a touch before curling a sumptuous effort past Simon Moore and over the line via the post.It was a goal that set the tone for the remainder of the game as Diogo Jota and Cavaleiro added goals of their own to secure a resounding 3-0 victory at Molineux.Click on the video above to see watch Ruben Neves' sensational effort
